nodes.text: Around 5 BBY, a flight school was located on Farstey that was used to train rebel pilots. In a message from Commander Jun Sato of Phoenix Cell to General Jan Dodonna, Sato believed that the RZ-1T trainer was extremely helpful in certifying bush pilots for A-wing starfighters, and stated that if models were available, the Farstey and Homon flight schools could use them.
